blocks.title: Brand Journey
blocks.subtitle: Elegance with Style
blocks.description: We are at the heart of carpet manufacturing since 1970's. Handling all the manufacturing process handled in-house gives us confidence in the final product quality. Each handcrafted carpet requires almost 100 man-hour of intensive human effort, creating a world class product with style and elegance.

blocks.title: FINEST QUALITY
blocks.subtitle: Timeless, Unique Indian Craft
blocks.description: Choose from a selection of beautiful handcrafted carpets for your home.

blocks.title: PREMIUM RUGS
blocks.subtitle: Crafted for Perfection
blocks.description: A perfect blend of beauty and elegance uniquely created for your abode.

blocks.title: Our Products
blocks.subtitle: Collection of exquisite rugs and home carpets, knotted, durries and children rugs.

footer.about: We have a very long presence in the carpet industry of Bhadohi and have been associated with multiple exporters. We manufacture pure ethnically designed Carpets par excellence since 1970.
